Package com.example.potato1_events

Class OrganizerHomeTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.potato1_events.OrganizerHomeTest
public class OrganizerHomeTest extends Object
Instrumented UI tests for OrganizerHomeActivity. Tests navigation and interactions from the organizer's perspective.
